AllCars.name: Maruti Suzuki Swift
AllCars.description: A popular petrol hatchback known for its peppy performance, fuel efficiency, and agile city handling.

AllCars.description: A premium compact SUV offering multiple engine options, advanced safety tech, and a modern infotainment system.

AllCars.description: A micro SUV featuring bold styling, high ground clearance, and a 5-star Global NCAP safety rating.

AllCars.description: A rugged 4x4 SUV equipped for off-roading, with turbocharged petrol/diesel engines and a removable hard top.

AllCars.description: A full-size SUV with a powerful diesel engine, robust ladder-frame chassis, and off-road capabilities.

AllCars.description: A sporty mid-size sedan offering segment-leading features, turbo-petrol performance, and sleek design.

AllCars.description: A spacious premium hatchback with a refined petrol engine, head-up display, and smart hybrid tech.

AllCars.description: A compact and budget-friendly SUV with turbo-petrol options and a sporty, youthful design.

AllCars.name: Maruti Brezza
AllCars.description: A reliable sub-compact SUV offering a smooth petrol engine, mild-hybrid tech, and strong urban appeal.

AllCars.description: A connected SUV with a spacious interior, large touchscreen, and internet-enabled features.
